content.rendered:
Checks

Bibledit runs a number of checks on the text of the Bibles. It does that every night.

  • Act on the results of the checks.
  • Receive the results by email.
  • Manage the checks.

Notes.

  • You deal with checks on the Bibles you have write access to.

Home
Review
